title: Black susano
author: Black susano
content: I have asked myself these questions on and on but It's  keep getting me confused about it but to my little picture of understanding  I  think he saw the future of crypto and how it will be useful to the new generation.  Some investigations I like to raise a question about the great Man Satoshi........1.  Why is Satoshi Nakamoto hiding???2 .  Can Satoshi Nakamoto ever shut down Bitcoin?3. On second thought most people presume "NICK SZABO"  is the real man behind the picture of cryptocurrency is this truthTake a look at this"Investigations: Satoshi Nakamoto, Mysterious Inventor of Bitcoin, Is Probably an Australian Computer Genius Named Craig Wright" https://nymag.com/intelligencer/2015/12/investigations-this-guy-is-bitcoins-inventor.html

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Way back in 2009, many people, once they review the white paper, saw the potential for Bitcoin.Right now, Satoshi is seeing what was only the future back then.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on August 08, 2023, 11:38:57 PM   Some investigations I like to raise a question about the great Man Satoshi........1.  Why is Satoshi Nakamoto hiding???If you have 1 million Bitcoin you will become the most sought-after inventor and celebrity because of what Bitcoin reached this level and beyond, do you think he can live a peaceful life a creator like Satoshi Nakamoto loves to be alone and secluded based on his personality some creators are known to be introvert.Quote2 .  Can Satoshi Nakamoto ever shut down Bitcoin?I don't think its possible Bitcoin is open source,  developers cannot see how it will become possible, but if he dumps his shares there's a possibility that the price will crash this is the likely scenariohttps://cointelegraph.com/news/what-if-satoshi-nakamoto-sold-all-his-bitcoin-today

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on August 08, 2023, 11:38:57 PM1.  Why is Satoshi Nakamoto hiding???A: He wants bitcoin to be centralized and not about himB: he is deadThere's no CQuote from: Black susano on August 08, 2023, 11:38:57 PM2 .  Can Satoshi Nakamoto ever shut down Bitcoin?Even if he would be alive, how could he do it when govenrments can't do it. Even if someone came out from hiding and sign the message as him, bitcoin is standing on its own. People also probably change their views about Satoshi and stopped glorifying him/her/them, because no one could live up to expectations people have of him.Quote from: Black susano on August 08, 2023, 11:38:57 PM3. On second thought most people presume "NICK SZABO"  is the real man behind the picture of cryptocurrency is this truthTake a look at this"Investigations: Satoshi Nakamoto, Mysterious Inventor of Bitcoin, Is Probably an Australian Computer Genius Named Craig Wright" https://nymag.com/intelligencer/2015/12/investigations-this-guy-is-bitcoins-inventor.htmlAll lies.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: I guess for the sake of Bitcoin decentralization Satoshi decided to pay the price by denying himself the freedom to enjoy from the wealth he created for the rest of the world who adopt it as an alternative currency and as an asset. So most time,  while other think Satoshi is dead or an acronyms, I believe that Satoshi already have a well planned game plans and he wanted to leave the scene quietly because he want Bitcoin to grow organically just as he mentioned in the white paper.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on August 08, 2023, 11:38:57 PM1.  Why is Satoshi Nakamoto hiding???Maybe Satoshi is not hiding. He didn't commit crime so he is not hiding from anyone. Rather he is anonymous, which means he could be your neighbour but you wouldn't know.Quote from: Black susano on August 08, 2023, 11:38:57 PM2 .  Can Satoshi Nakamoto ever shut down Bitcoin?Even if he has the power to fo so, it won't be wise shutting down what he created. He will rather be happy that bitcoin is making waves. But to shut bitcoin means that majority of the bitcoin developers will agree. It is not possible because everyone cannot agree, even if majority agrees, the disagreeing minority will perform a hardfork.Quote from: Black susano on August 08, 2023, 11:38:57 PMTake a look at this"Investigations: Satoshi Nakamoto, Mysterious Inventor of Bitcoin, Is Probably an Australian Computer Genius Named Craig Wright" https://nymag.com/intelligencer/2015/12/investigations-this-guy-is-bitcoins-inventor.htmlIf you are a newbie to bitcoin, it will be fine if you forget all the bitcoin and Satoshi drama and focus on learning bitcoin. The drama is now mysterious.
